title: Did Kamala Harris Say Protests Are ‘Not Gonna Let Up, and They Should Not’?
subtitle: Comments by the Democratic vice presidential candidate led to claims that she encourages rioting.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In a June 2020 interview, U.S. Democratic vice presidential candidate Kamala Harris said of the nationwide anti-police brutality protests: “Everyone beware. They're not gonna stop before election day in November, and they're not gonna stop after election day ... They’re not gonna let up, and they should not.”
